titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 100th Anniversary of the founding of the American Hellenic Educational Progressive Association.
A resolution commemorating the 100th Anniversary of the founding of the American Hellenic Educational Progressive Association.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the significant contributions of citizens of Hellenic heritage to the United States. It also commemorates the 100th anniversary of the founding of the American Hellenic Educational Progressive Association.
